thread.title: Revealed: Here's the first look of 'Housefull 3'
thread.title_full: Revealed: Here's the first look of 'Housefull 3'

author: Deccan
title: Revealed: Here's the first look of 'Housefull 3'
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 20, 2015, 15.00 pm Mumbai: The makers of ‘Housefull 3’ have released the film’s first look and it’s every bit of intriguing as it gets.
In the first look picture, we see Akshay Kumar in his sporty avatar, whereas Jacqueline looks nothing less than a stunning diva. Abhishek Bachchan and Riteish Deshmukh look sophisticatedly cute, whereas their leading ladies in the film, Lisa Haydon and Nargis Fakhri pull off a very classy look.
The third instalment of the ‘Housefull’ flick will only hit theatres next year, but has managed to capture their fans’ attention with the number of pictures and hilarious videos from the sets.
The team finished ‘Housefull 3’s first schedule in London.
